channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description: When i am attacking a NPC i get no XP. Is there anyway to fix this? I can't find it anywhere. Thanks, Nick :cool:

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @Nick-World Nick-World
item.description:
@Nick-World wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:2, topic:386882”]Theres tons of different reasons that could be causing this…

Check to see if you have a boolean called XPlock or something and make sure its set to false.[/quote]
Okay i just figured out i am getting xp its just not the right thing example
Block=Attack xp
I’m trying to look in the action buttons it doesn’t seem to help

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Theres tons of different reasons that could be causing this…

Check to see if you have a boolean called XPlock or something and make sure its set to false.

Read full topic
